name: Beer Feud
description: Beer Feud is a real-time drinking game where you drink beer and get points. Instead of the old playing cards you play this partygame on your Big screen TV with you friends. The game keeps track of 6 players so you can play as singles or by team. If you play as a team, unlimited players can participate. The game has two differentplay options "Drink or Shot". The game has a world highscoreboard online.
